intro.title: Niux-Discovery Help Center
intro.subtitle: Your AI-powered GitHub exploration and content aggregation platform.
intro.description: Niux-Discovery is an open-source web application designed to help you automatically discover, translate, and summarize trending GitHub projects or custom web content. Integrating Gemini or OpenAI, it transforms complex technical documents into easy-to-understand summaries.

quickStart.title: 1. Quick Start (Configure API)
quickStart.desc: You MUST configure an API key before using any AI features. This is the most important step.
quickStart.step1: Click the **Gear Icon** or **Admin Dashboard** button in the top right corner to enter settings.
quickStart.step2: In the "AI Configuration" section, click **Add a key**.
quickStart.step3: Select Provider (Google Gemini or OpenAI Compatible).
quickStart.step4: Enter your API Key. For OpenAI compatible interfaces (like DeepSeek), also fill in the **Base URL**.
quickStart.step5: Enter the applicable model name (e.g., gemini-2.5-flash, gpt-4o, deepseek-chat).

browsing.title: 2. Browsing & Discovery
browsing.categoryDesc: Use the top category bar to filter technical fields (e.g., Frontend, AI).
browsing.viewModeDesc: Click the icons in the top right to switch between **Grid View** and **List View**.
browsing.searchDesc: Type keywords in the search bar to filter projects by title, introduction, or tech stack in real-time.

projectDetail.title: 3. Project Deep Dive
projectDetail.desc: Click any card to enter the detail page.
features: **AI Summary**: Read the AI-generated introduction and core highlights.
**Translate Readme**: Click the "AI Translate Readme" button to translate the original documentation.
**View Original**: Click "View on GitHub" to visit the source repository.

admin.title: 4. Admin Features
admin.access: Click the **Gear Icon** in the navigation bar to enter.
admin.dashboard: **Dashboard**: View content stats, storage usage, and perform quick actions like "Refresh GitHub".
admin.content: **Content Management**: View all scraped content. Search, bulk delete, or manually edit AI-generated summaries (supports AI regeneration).
admin.plugins: **Data Source Plugins**: Manage scraping sources. Besides the built-in GitHub scraper, you can create "Custom Plugins" by entering a URL and instruction, letting AI scrape and summarize any web content.
admin.settings: **Settings**: Manage API keys, change site name/logo, set admin password, toggle dark mode, etc.

security.title: 5. Security & Privacy
security.local: **Local Storage**: Your API keys and all data are stored ONLY in your browser's LocalStorage and are not uploaded to any third-party server.
security.password: **Admin Lock**: You can configure an "Admin Password" in settings to prevent unauthorized changes on shared devices.
